name: Mortgage Calculator
author: mgplugin

sections.description:
The Mortgage Calculator helps estimate the monthly payment due along with other financial costs associated with mortgages.

For using This plugin you Can Know What kind of interest rate you can get? What kind of payment should you expect?.

To run this plugin you need to put shortcode in your page:
([wmc_calc])

Features:

  • Easy to use
  • Mobile friendly ui
  • Change calculator background color
  • Customize header title text and font size
  • Also customize header border color
  • Customize form input field title color, background hover color
  • Display result with chart
  • Select chart type
  • Change chart monthley payment, total payment and total interset color
  • Customize schedule Sttting
  • Enable/ Disable annual and monthly schedule
  • Customize header title text
  • Customize result text setting
  • Customize result chart text setting
  • Set min and max purchase price with default value
  • Set min and max rate of interest with default rate
  • Set min and max loan term with default year
sections.installation:
1. Download the file to install and activate.
  2. Done! Just remember to keep the plugins up to date!
